english.segment1: For all the times I've failed You, Lord. Forgive me. For all the ways I've fallen short. Lord, forgive me now. God, I'm so in need of grace. I fall upon my face. Forgive me
english.segment2: You see the tears fall down my face. Forgive me. Take my fear, Lord, take my shame. Lord, forgive me now. Purify me, make me new. Like only You can do. Forgive me now
english.segment3: Lord, we come to honor You. We are forgiven. We bring our love and thanks to You. We are forgiven now
english.segment4: God we praise You for Your grace. Before You we are raised. Forgiven. God we praise You for Your grace. Before You we are raised. Forgiven. Forgiven
